Subject: English
EQDescription: Scripts were assessed holistically using the published EQs. Benchmarks were used to establish the standard required in each of three interrelated skills:

Subject: English
EQSkills: The capacity to create a reading of the text's ideas/values

Subject: English
EQSkills: The capacity to sequence and substantiate ideas relevant to the topic

Subject: English
EQSkills: The capacity to communicate these ideas
